# delegate

**Instance Property**

The user activity object’s delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSUserActivityDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The user activity delegate is informed when the activity is being saved or continued. For more information on how to implement the delegate, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivityDelegate].

## Accessing the delegate

- **NSUserActivityDelegate**: The interface through which a user activity instance notifies its delegate of updates.
